Title: The Shining
Introduction: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

Title: Spirited Away
Introduction: During her family's move to the suburbs, a young girl wanders into a world populated by spirits and gods.

Title: The Truman Show
Introduction: An insurance salesman discovers his entire life is actually a TV show.

Title: 365: Repeat the Year
Introduction: Participants from different backgrounds get the chance to turn back time and change their past year, but soon realize that altering the past comes at a deadly cost.

Title: Butterfly Effect
Introduction: A young man finds he can travel back in time to change his past.

Title: The Wandering Earth
Introduction: Humanity unites to move Earth out of its orbit to avoid an expanding sun, facing cosmic hazards.

Title: Coherence
Introduction: On the night of an astronomical anomaly, eight friends gather for a dinner party, but strange occurrences disrupt the evening.

Title: Your Name
Introduction: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies.

Title: Howl's Moving Castle
Introduction: When an unkind witch transforms a young woman into an old lady, she seeks refuge in a magical moving castle.

Title: Red Beard
Introduction: In 19th century Japan, a young intern learns about compassion and humanity from a gruff but kind doctor.

Title: Mr and Mrs Smith
Introduction: A bored married couple discovers they are both spies working for opposing agencies.

Title: Love Actually
Introduction: Various love stories unfold in London during the Christmas season.

Title: Crouching Tiger Hidden Dragon
Introduction: A skilled warrior gives up his sword, only for it to be stolen and a quest to recover it to ensue.

Title: Hero
Introduction: An unnamed warrior recounts his encounters with three assassins who nearly killed the king of Qin.

Title: House of Flying Daggers
Introduction: A love triangle develops between a police captain, a rebel leader, and a blind dancer.

Title: Infernal Affairs
Introduction: A cop infiltrates the triads while a triad member infiltrates the police force and they try to expose each other.

Title: Farewell My Concubine
Introduction: Two Peking Opera actors navigate love, politics, and rivalry over decades of turbulent Chinese history.

Title: Raise the Red Lantern
Introduction: A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord and navigates the jealousies of his other wives.

Title: To Live
Introduction: A family's struggles and perseverance through the Chinese Civil War and Cultural Revolution are depicted over several decades.

Title: A Touch of Sin
Introduction: Four loosely connected stories of violence and injustice in modern China unfold simultaneously.

Title: Red Cliff
Introduction: A large-scale warlord battle unfolds on the Yangtze River during the Three Kingdoms period.

Title: The Grandmaster
Introduction: The life and times of Ip Man, the wing-chun grandmaster who trained Bruce Lee.

Title: Lust Caution
Introduction: A young woman is tasked with seducing a powerful politician during the Japanese occupation of Shanghai.

Title: Still Life
Introduction: Two individuals search for their spouses amidst the demolition of the Three Gorges area in China.

Title: The Eight Hundred
Introduction: During the Sino-Japanese War, the defense of Shanghai's Sihang Warehouse becomes legendary.

Title: Ash Is Purest White
Introduction: A gangster’s moll faces imprisonment and reunites with her lover in a rapidly changing China.

Title: The Battle at Lake Changjin
Introduction: Chinese forces fight against UN troops during the Korean War’s Battle of Chosin Reservoir.

Title: Let the Bullets Fly
Introduction: A bandit impersonates a governor and engages in a humorous power struggle in 1920s China.

Title: Blind Shaft
Introduction: Two miners conspire to murder a colleague to extort compensation from mine operators.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Introduction: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Title: Ne Zha
Introduction: A rebellious demon child fights against fate to become a hero in this animated reimagining of myth.

Title: Wolf Warrior 2
Introduction: An ex-soldier battles arms dealers to protect African villagers in this high-octane action sequel.

Title: Wolf Warrior 1
Introduction: An elite soldier takes on a group of mercenaries in this action-packed military film.

Title: Akira
Introduction: A biker gang member tries to save his friend from a secret government psychic project that unleashes a dangerous power.

Title: Princess Mononoke
Introduction: A young prince becomes embroiled in a struggle between forest gods and humans who consume its resources.

Title: My Neighbor Totoro
Introduction: Two girls move to the countryside and discover magical creatures called Totoros living in nearby forests.

Title: Ghost in the Shell
Introduction: In a cybernetic future, a cyborg policewoman hunts a mysterious hacker called the Puppet Master.

Title: Perfect Blue
Introduction: An idol singer's descent into paranoia after quitting her pop career leads to a terrifying identity crisis.

Title: Paprika
Introduction: A device that allows therapists to enter patients' dreams falls into the wrong hands, blurring reality and fantasy.

Title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
Introduction: A high-school girl gains the ability to time-travel and soon discovers the unintended consequences of changing the past.

Title: Weathering with You
Introduction: A runaway boy meets a girl who can manipulate the weather, and they struggle to survive in a drenched Tokyo.

Title: A Silent Voice
Introduction: A former bully seeks redemption by reconnecting with the deaf girl he tormented in elementary school.

Title: Millennium Actress
Introduction: A retired actress recounts her life story to a filmmaker, weaving her memories with scenes from her films.

Title: Crash Landing on You
Introduction: A South Korean heiress accidentally paraglides into North Korea and falls in love with an army officer who helps her hide.

Title: Descendants of the Sun
Introduction: A special forces officer and a doctor fall in love while serving in a fictional war-torn country.

Title: Goblin
Introduction: An immortal goblin seeks a human bride to end his cursed life, until he meets a high-school girl with a mysterious past.

Title: My Love from the Star
Introduction: An alien who landed on Earth 400 years ago falls in love with a top actress as his departure looms near.

Title: Itaewon Class
Introduction: An ex-con and his friends open a bar in Seoul’s Itaewon neighborhood, seeking revenge on a powerful food conglomerate.

Title: Reply 1988
Introduction: Friends and families in a Seoul neighborhood navigate adolescence, love, and family in the late 1980s.

Title: Kingdom
Introduction: A crown prince investigates a mysterious plague spreading across his kingdom and discovers hordes of undead rising.

Title: Healer
Introduction: A nighttime errand-runner with the codename 'Healer' uncovers hidden truths when hired to track a reporter.

Title: Signal
Introduction: A detective in 2015 uses a mysterious walkie-talkie to communicate with a police officer from 1989, solving cold cases.

Title: Reply 1994
Introduction: College students from various provinces live together in a boarding house and experience friendship and first loves.

Title: Inglourious Basterds
Introduction: A group of Jewish-American soldiers plan to assassinate Nazi leaders in occupied France.
